<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Keeper Vault Alerts Transform Map">f9e1b4f3c33aae10eb251c63e40131d3</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>timestamp</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
    var isoDate = source.timestamp; // Replace with your source field name
	gs.info("[Keeper Vault Alerts] - TransformMap received datetime as: "+JSON.stringify(source));

    // GlideDateTime can parse ISO format
    var gdt = new GlideDateTime(isoDate);

	// Add your code here
	return gdt; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_keese_keeper_sec_keeper_vault_alerts_import_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>srujan-metron</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-07-25 07:03:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>19d06948c38fee10eb251c63e401316b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>timestamp</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Keeper Security ITSM" source="x_keese_keeper_sec">ada622f0c3f66210eb251c63e40131fd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Keeper Security ITSM">ada622f0c3f66210eb251c63e40131fd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_19d06948c38fee10eb251c63e401316b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>srujan-metron</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-07-29 06:39:43</sys_updated_on><target_field>incident_detection_date</target_field><target_table>sn_si_incident</target_table><use_source_script>false</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
